name: Maelstrom: Heroes of Microtransactions
description:
Hey! If you loved Magic the Gathering, Pokemon the Card Game, Hearthstone, you're gonna feel "bleh" about this game. Lather yourself in the ointment of victory and feel the abrasive touch of the RANDOM NUMBER GENERATOR in Maelstrom: Heroes of Microtransactions.

Made for the GBTK 5 Jam. It's a terrible game for a terrible jam!

Medieval Tension 60s by Cory Gray: http://www.needledrop.co/artists/cory-gray/

Remember the Way {123 & 4/4} by Mid-Air Machine: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Ask%20Again
